page.description: DEAD. OBSOLETE. V8 This picture shows a sample Enter/Edit Web Users dialog as configured by the Configure Desktop Web Users Form dialog. Note that the Comment field is an additional, un-required field that was added to the user security table.

step.description: Click the New Record button New Record to create a new entry in the user security table.
Enter the required data in the User Security Information controls.
Click the Permissions button to display the Permissions dialog.
Select the group(s) to which this user belongs and click OK.
Click Save to save your changes.
